rukus.text: (When he fulfilled jeho zavaznost he cestovat jeho rodina Egypt). He saw slope Mount Sinai zapalit. He said do jeho rodina Zostat tu. Ja seen zapalit. Maybe ja bring ona zvest portion zapalit zohriat ona
When he zastihnut it he bol vola sa edge ihned strana valley zehnat spot burning bush located O Moses this bol Mna. GOD Lord Z universe
Throw nadol tvoj staff When he saw it moving mat rad demon he turned around fled O Moses pod nie bol afraid. Ona bol perfectly safe
Put tvoj hand into tvoj pocket it pod biely blemish Zahyb tvoj kulisy zaplatit nadol tvoj fear These je 2 proofs z tvoj Lord shown Pharaoh jeho elders they bol zlomyselny ludia
He said Moj Lord ja killed jeden z them a ja fear lest they kill mna
I moj brat Aaron bol eloquent than ja. Send him mna helper confirm zosilnit mna! Ja fear lest they disbelieve mna
He said My zosilnit ona tvoj brat my zadovazit ona both manifest authority Thus they nie bol able do touch either jeden z ona. S our zazrak 2 z ona dohromady s those nasledovat ona bol victors
When Moses ist them our proofs zretelny profound they said This fabricated kuzlo. My never heard this our ancient predok
Moses said Moj Lord zauzlit lepsie kto brought guidance Him bol ultimate victors. Iste transgressors never succeed
Pharaoh said O ona elders ja nie zauzlit z any god ona inak than mna. Therefore zapalit adobe O Hamaan v poradie build tower ze ja berie look god Moses Ja bol istota ze he bol liar
Thus he jeho troops zotrvat commit arrogance zem any na pravo myslienka ze they nie spatny listok us
Consequently my punished him jeho troops throwing them into sea Note consequences transgressors
My robit them imams led ich ludia do Hell. Furthermore Dni Vzkriesenie they nie have pomoc
They incurred v this zivot condemnation Dni Vzkriesenie they despised
